attributes.action: Pass a law that main stream media must tell the public the truth.
attributes.additional_details: We the people have had enough of the lies. We can see with our own eyes that they are lying. Enough falsehoods, truth is the only way.
attributes.background: I would like our parliament to pass a law to make main stream media tell the people the truth.  No more opinion pieces told to us as truth.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for deciding on the content of the media, but you might like to sign this petition about increased regulation:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573850
